N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 461.7 - Unaudited items

State Regulations

When, at the end of any year or at such other times as a
financial statement may be required by the commission, it is known that a
transaction has occurred which affects the accounts, but the amount involved in
the transaction and its effect upon the accounts can not be determined with
absolute accuracy, then the amount shall be estimated and such estimated amount
included in the proper accounts. When the item is audited appropriate
adjustments shall be made in the current accounts. The utility is not required
to anticipate minor items which would not appreciably affect the
accounts. Notes
